Solar Wrath.name: Solar Wrath
Solar Wrath.flavor: Radiant light explodes from you like a flare, evaporating shadows and dealing illuminating damage to everything around you.
Solar Wrath.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. If the target is either an undead creature or a demon, it is also stunned until the end of your next turn.

Healing Sun.name: Healing Sun
Healing Sun.flavor: A healing sun shines forth from you, repairing the wounds of your allies while keeping creatures of darkness at bay.
Healing Sun.effect: The burst creates a zone of bright light that lasts until the end of your next turn. You or any ally who ends his or her turn in the zone regains hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier. A demon or an undead creature that ends its turn in the zone takes 5 + your Charisma modifier radiant damage.
Healing Sun.sustainStandard: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.
Healing Sun.special: The zone ends at the end of your turn if you are bloodied.

Radiant Brilliance.name: Radiant Brilliance
Radiant Brilliance.flavor: You fire a brilliant ray of searing light into a foe, igniting that foe and briefly turning it into a small sun.
Radiant Brilliance.effect: At the start of your next turn, the target is the center of a burst 5 attack that affects only your enemies (not including the target): Wisdom vs. Will; 3d10 radiant damage on a hit, and half damage on a miss.
